title: "Course about evidence-based study techniques"

As a postdoc at KTH Royal Institute of Technology, I developed a free 30-minute online course that teaches evidence-based study techniques using question-based learning (learn by answer questions and receive feedback).

You can access the course for free here. Just sign in as a guest.
